blogs.title: Soviet Moon Lander Discovered Water on the Moon in 1976
blogs.summary:
The last Soviet mission to the moon, Luna-24, returned to Earth with water-rich rocks from beneath the lunar surface. But the West ignored the result.

The possibility of water on the moon has excited scientists and science fiction fans for decades. If we
